item.title: Pulse Width Modulation (PWM)
item.description: The RaspberryPi hardware supports 2 hardware PWM channels. But as Pi4J uses PiGPIO “under the hood”, we can take advantage of the The Raspberry Pi supports 2 hardware based PWM channels. You can access these two channels via 2 separate sets of 4 GPIO header pins. But still limited to only 2 channels (2 unique PWM timing configurations). The same PWM channel is available on multiple GPIO. The latest frequency and dutycycle setting will be used by all GPIO which share a PWM channel.
